title: Spiderman Push-ups / Pushups
description: Standing Cable Chest Press Browse all exercises Spiderman push-ups / pushups is a at-home work out exercise that targets chest and triceps and also involves abs and shoulders. Refer to the illustration diagram and instructions above for how to perform this exercise correctly. Kneeling t-bar presses / landmine presses, underhand grip barbell bench press and standing cable chest press are related exercise that target the same muscle groups as spiderman push-ups / pushups. Visit our free illustrated exercise directory for more exercises to try in your workouts.
